sentences.en: Beside foot-binding, there are some other habitude effects women participate in social labor and strengthen sexual division of labor in peasant family.
sentences.cn: 除缠足外还有一系列的习俗束缚着妇女参与社会劳动，强化着农村家庭内两性间的性别分工。

sentences.en: Chapter tuo analysed the cause of mongolian living habitude changed historical background and societal economy.
sentences.cn: 第二章为近代以来内蒙古东部地区蒙古人生活习俗发生变化的历史背景和社会经济原因。

sentences.en: From long time ago, Chinese and Russia has become a kind of unique culture in tea history, tea habitude, tea sets and poems for tea.
sentences.cn: 千百年来，中华民族和俄罗斯民族在饮茶的历史、饮茶习俗、茶具等方面，都形成了独具特色的茶文化。

sentences.en: She became more mature and beautiful, and her habitude became more girlish.
sentences.cn: 它变的更成熟美丽, 连气质也变的很有小女生的感觉.

sentences.en: While Modern emigrant reclaimed and Mongolian and Chinese lived together, the traditional living habitude of Mongolian has made many changes in Inner Mongolia.
sentences.cn: 近代以来的移民开垦和蒙汉杂居局面的形成，使得内蒙古地区蒙古人传统生活习俗发生了诸多变化。

words.tran_cn: 习惯的；惯常的；习以为常的
习惯，熟习；[生理] 习惯化
